name: 3exbidv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w2)))))

stmt.origin: 2exbidv(s0, s1, w0, wex(s2, w1), wex(s2, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w2)))))
-| wi(w0, wb(wex(s2, w1), wex(s2, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w2)))))
-| wi(w0, wb(wex(s2, w1), wex(s2, w2)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wex(s2, w1), wex(s2, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s2, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w1))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, w2)))))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
-| diffsw(s2, w0)

comment: Formula-building rule for three existential quantifiers (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 1-May-1995.)
